 Substitution of class ` A ` for ordered pair ` <. x , y >. ` . (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-1996.)  (Revised by Andrew Salmon, 11-Jul-2011.)
statement:
copsexg $p |- ( A = <. x , y >. -> ( ph <-> E. x E. y ( A = <. x , y >. /\ ph ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d A y $.
